attributes.action: maintain his line on fuel duty, and resist blockaders who hold the country to ransom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While everyone can be sympathetic to those suffering from fuel price increases, taxation is set to help reduce our fuel usage as well as to generate income for public services. We need to adjust to high prices and scarcity, and the sooner the better. People have a right to campaign and protest to raise awareness of their issues, but not to threaten the lifeblood of the country by blockading. The Prime Minister needs to resist anyone attempting to hold the country to ransom for their own gain, and keep our infrastructure running smoothly.
